text:
Person from #BAME background:
"Is it true that if you are Black or say from Pakistan,you are at ⬆️ risk with #COVID19"
Yes
"With evidence to back that?"
Yes!
"Like proper science?"
Hell yes!
"Does that mean I get the #Vaccine earlier?"
No-we are working on those myths you have https://t.co/ieq44xxJ36
